hymn.title: Under His wings I am safely abiding

layout.singingstanza: Un -- der His wings I am safe -- ly a -- bid -- ing; Though the night deep -- ens and tem -- pests are wild, Still I can trust Him, I know He will keep me; He has re -- deemed me, and I am His child. Un -- der His wings, un -- der His wings, Who from His love can sev -- er? Un -- der His wings my soul shall a -- bide, Safe -- ly a -- bide for -- ev -- er.

lyrics.stanza: Under His wings, under His wings, Who from His love can sever? Under His wings my soul shall abide, Safely abide forever.
Under His wings—what a refuge in sorrow! How the heart yearningly turns to His rest! Often when earth has no balm for my healing, There I find comfort, and there I am blest.
